title: Sword of Screams
content:
Sword of Screams Uncommon 2~12 Damage 1d8Piercing+ 1d4 Psychic Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A blade of flawless craft. As is parts the air, you fancy you can hear a faint, whispering shriek... Rapier Finesse 0.9 130

Sword of Screams

1d8Piercing+ 1d4 Psychic

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

A blade of flawless craft. As is parts the air, you fancy you can hear a faint, whispering shriek...

Sword of Screams is one of the Martial Melee Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc). Characters need to master certain Proficiency before using a weapon, and sometimes gain a special Actions while holding it.

A blade of flawless craft. As is parts the air, you fancy you can hear a faint, whispering shriek...

Sword of Screams Location & Where to Find

Location: Can be found at Grymforge Dropped by: True Soul Nere

Sword of Screams Notes & Tips

Proficiency: Martial Weapon Proficiency or Rapier Proficiency Rarity: Uncommon Value: 130 Gp. Weight: 0.9 Kg. Deals 1D4 worth of Psychic Damage on hit UID: de499147-5f1b-2eee-0d6e-b51014a27957
